doc:
Adam Arkin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adam_Arkin 0 Adam Arkin (born August 19, 1956) is an American television, film and stage actor, and director. He played the role of Aaron Shutt on Chicago Hope. He has been nominated for numerous awards, including a Tony (Best Actor, 1991, I Hate Hamlet) as well as three primetime Emmys, four SAG Awards (Ensemble, Chicago Hope), and a DGA Award (My Louisiana Sky). In 2002, Arkin won a Daytime Emmy for Outstanding Directing in a Children's Special for My Louisiana Sky. He is also one of the three actors to portray Dale "The Whale" Biederbeck on Monk. Between 2007 and 2009, he starred in the NBC drama Life. Beginning in 1990 he had guest role on Northern Exposure playing the angry paranoid Adam, for which he received an Emmy nomination. In 2009, he portrayed villain Ethan Zobelle, a white separatist gang leader, on the FX original series Sons of Anarchy. Adam_Arkin ( born August_19_,_1956 ) is an_American_television_,_film_and_stage_actor , and director . He played the_role of Aaron_Shutt on Chicago_Hope . He has_been_nominated for numerous_awards , including a_Tony_(_Best_Actor , 1991 , I Hate Hamlet ) as_well_as three_primetime_Emmys , four_SAG_Awards_(_Ensemble , Chicago_Hope_) , and a_DGA_Award ( My_Louisiana_Sky_) . In 2002 , Arkin won a_Daytime_Emmy for Outstanding_Directing in a_Children 's_Special for My_Louisiana_Sky . He is also_one of the_three_actors to_portray Dale " The_Whale_"_Biederbeck on Monk . Between 2007_and_2009 , he starred in the_NBC_drama_Life . Beginning in 1990 he had guest_role on Northern_Exposure playing the_angry_paranoid_Adam , for which he received an_Emmy_nomination . In 2009 , he portrayed villain_Ethan_Zobelle , a_white_separatist_gang_leader , on the_FX_original_series_Sons of Anarchy .
